name: Shoot That Squid
description:
Sail the seas on a pirate ship and shoot those squids!

  • Arena-based shooter with pirate theme!
  • 10 levels with 2 bosses!
  • Hunt high scores by shooting squids and collecting powerups!
  • Supports keyboard controls & Xbox One controller!

Game made by Rämä Games, team of five students. Version 1.0, named Shoot That Nessie, was finished in November 2018 and was developed for a custom two-player controller. Shoot That Squid includes new features and fixes bugs.

This version is built for single player mode, but you can still play together with a friend on one keyboard, with one player controlling the ship and the other controlling the cannon.

Controls can be viewed in the options menu.
